de.polygonal.gl.color.HSV

type
class

Constructor

new()

Instance Variables

h : Float

The hue in the range [0,360]

s : Float

The saturation in the range [0,1] If s == 0, then h = -1 (undefined).

set(inline,null) : h : Float -> s : Float -> v : Float -> Void

v : Float

The value in the range [0,1]
